name: py-contextvars
description:
This package implements a backport of Python 3.7 contextvars module (see
PEP 567) for Python 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-immutables
dependencies.description: An immutable mapping type for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-sniffio
dependent_to.description:
This is a tiny package whose only purpose is to let you detect which
async library your code is running under.

dependent_to.name: py-qiskit-terra
dependent_to.description:
Qiskit is an open-source SDK for working with quantum computers at the
level of extended quantum circuits, operators, and algorithms.

dependent_to.name: mxnet
dependent_to.description:
MXNet is a deep learning framework designed for both efficiency and
flexibility.

dependent_to.name: py-anyio
dependent_to.description:
High level compatibility layer for multiple asynchronous event loop
implementations.
